トウキョウガイコクゴダイガク フゾクトショカン

@graph.v:fn: 東京外国語大学 附属図書館
dc:description: The Library Tokyo University of Foreign Studies
3-11-1,Asahi-cho Fuchu-shi Tokyo 183-8534
URL:http://www.tufs.ac.jp/library/index-j.html (website)
URL:http://www.tufs.ac.jp/library/index5-j.html (map)
来館利用担当:サービス係
受付時間:授業期間 平日 9:00-21:00  土日 13:00-18:00  授業期間外 平日 9:00-16:30  土日 休館
注意事項:学外者はカウンターで所定の手続が必要。また館外貸出不可。取り置き希望の場合、所属機関を通してFaxにより事前申込。研究室所蔵の資料については閲覧不可。貴重書の閲覧は平日のみ。
持参書類:閲覧許可願書
館外貸出:不可
国民の祝日、年末年始、毎月最終水曜日、蔵書点検のため夏季及び春季休業期間中の一定期間休館する場合がある。
ILL-Staff:YAMATO, KAMIMURA, TONOOKA
ILL-Dept:Library Service Section
ILL-Org:Tokyo University of Foreign Studies Library
ILL-Adress:3-11-1 Asahi-cho, Fuchu-shi, Tokyo, JAPAN
ILL-Commun1:TEL:+81-42-330-5196 / FAX:+81-42-330-5199 / E-mail:tosho-service@tufs.ac.jp
ILL-Commun2:OPAC:http://www-lib.tufs.ac.jp/opac/index.html / HomePage:http://www.tufs.ac.jp/common/library/
ILL-Accept: Foreign(1): OCLC(NII-OCLC link):JATUF / Foreign(2): KERIS
ILL-Sched:Closed:Dec 28-Jan 4
ILL-Bill:Foreign(1):OCLC=OCLC-IFM only / Foreign(2):KERIS=NII Fee Management Service only
ILL-Loan-Period:Foreign(1):6 weeks; up to 3 items per library / Foreign(2):NA
ILL-Loan-Renew:Foreign(1):None / Foreign(2):NA
ILL-Loan-Charge:Foreign(1):Postage. Delivery method: via airmail / Foreign(2):NA
ILL-Non-Circulation:Special collection, mcrfrm, mcrfch, ref, per, news, a-v, DIS
ILL-Copy-Charge:Photocopy:35 YEN per sheet / Postage required / Delivery Method:via airmail
ILL-Note:Only the items held at the Main Library are available
ILL-OCLC-Symbol:JATUF
ILL-Loan-Renewal:one time / 2 weeks
ILL-Loan-Charge:Borrowing libraries should pay the postage costs of both borrowing materials from and returning them to us by registered mail.
ILL-Loan-Delivery-method:Tracked system

ILL-Non-Circulation-items:Rare and precious materials, old Japanese books, large-sized books, maps, reference books, periodicals, Books in deteriorated condition, microfilms, microfiches, books published before 1900
ILL-Copy-Charge:40 JPY per sheet [per exposure] and Postage
ILL-Copy-Delivery-method:Airmail, E-mail
ILL-Note:Only the items held at the Main Library and those entrusted to it to lend by the Departmental Libraries are available for loan / Dissertation: COPY: author's permission required
